name: vvtest

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Vvtest is a test harness originally authored by Richard Drake for the
Alegra-Emphasis project, written in pure Python, and designed for
running verification, validation, and regression type tests. Being a
stand-alone product, it can also be used by analysts to help manage sets
of simulations, especially useful on batch platforms.
